attributes.action: stop wasting tax payers money on opening another doctors practice and walk in centre in South Birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With sufficent funding GP's will embrace extended opening hours and give an 8 - 8 service.  The cost of building premises and all the overheads these will incurr when we already have the capacity to provide this service but  not the money is extremely short sighted.  This plan poses a considerable destablilising threat and is a senseless waste of money.
